name: Space Maze (itch) (Yiwei Wu)
description:
• Introduction: the earth has been contaminated by invaders. Shoot all the enemies to win.
  • Instructions: (You can also go over it in the main menu)

  1. Use W, S, A, D keys to control the aircraft to move up, down, left and right.

  2. Click the left mouse button to launch projectiles.

  3. Shoot all enemies (including meteorites) to win.

  • Changes made on the basis of the course:

  1. A page main menu has been added.

  2. Two audio source has been added. (Main menu & L3 audio source credit to: Yoann Laulan)

  3. Two levels has been added.

  4. Enemies has been modified, including a newly added boss.

  etc.

Credit to 

Yiwei Wu
